metadata.title: CVE-2019-19624 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-updates 18.04 LTS (bionic) - low
metadata.description:
An out-of-bounds read was discovered in OpenCV before 4.1.1. Specifically,variable coarsest_scale is assumed to be greater than or equal tofinest_scale within the calc()/ocl_calc() functions in dis_flow.cpp.However, this is not true when dealing with small images, leading to anout-of-bounds read of the heap-allocated arrays Ux and Uy.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-19624` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libopencv-calib3d3.2 - 3.2.0+dfsg-4ubuntu0.1+esm4
libopencv-contrib3.2 - 3.2.0+dfsg-4ubuntu0.1+esm4
